scripts.train: node src/train.js && cd gists/model && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && browserify build/index.js | sed 's/debug = true/debug = false/' | terser --compress --mangle > ./gists/atlasapproxnlp/atlasapproxnlp.js && cd gists/atlasapproxnlp && git add . && git commit -m 'bump' && git push && cd ../..
scripts.testBrowser: npm run build && browserify build/index.js | terser --compress --mangle > test/index.js && firefox test/index.html
